text: Their prophet dictus to them DEUS appointed Taloot (Saul) est tuus rex. They dictus Quam potuit he habet kingship nos when nos est dignus de kingship than he; he est non et rich He dictus DEUS chosen eum vos beatus eum abundance knowledge in corporis DEUS grants His kingship whomever He testimentum! DEUS est Bounteous Omniscient
